hero.title: Hello, I'm Eduardo de Paula.
hero.imageAltText: Person smiling and looking at the camera, with a blurred background of a cityscape at night.
hero.description: Full-stack software developer passionate about creating solutions.

description.first: As a full-stack developer, I have experience in developing web applications using Node.js and React. I also work on creating virtual assistants using Dialogflow, Blip, and ODA.
description.second: I possess expertise in developing RESTful APIs, integrating with third-party services, automated testing, and agile methodologies. I am always eager to learn and improve my skills, delivering high-quality solutions that meet users' needs.
description.third: I have knowledge of cloud solutions such as AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, among others), OCI, and Azure, as well as experience with emerging technologies like AI (GenAI, RAG) and Machine Learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
